text: Jordan is a town in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Garfield County. As of the 2020 United States Census, there were 356 people. A post office was opened in Jordan on July 11, 1899. Jordan was incorporated as a town in 1951. ==References== Category:Towns in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:20th-century establishments in Montana Category:1951 establishments in the United States
title: Jordan, Montana
